name: garter stitch baby cardigan
notes:
i decided to write down and publish this pattern since many people had favourited this project in ravelry… it´s my first time writing down a pattern and my english is a little poor, so bare with me if there are any mistakes…

spanish translation of the pattern is available thanks to maría josé ([mjinbarcelona][1]). [you can find it here.][2]

french translation of the pattern is now available thanks to 
lydia ([misstlog][3]).  [you can find it here.][4]

italian translation of the pattern is now available thanks to [barbara ajroldi][5].

enjoy!


  [1]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/mjinbarcelona
  [2]: http://kettlesandmittens.blogspot.com.ar/2009/09/garter-stitch-baby-kimono-traduccion.html
  [3]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/misstlog
  [4]: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0b3svjgqpvgjqzs1mn3lwekjrr1n4sgluy0djnvgzqq/view?resourcekey=0-vmhfjka0xjolf6pk8csa2q
  [5]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/ajroldi
